text: Jo nagūed (ej muşrikon), ki agar ʙar mo niz kitoʙ nozil meşud, (cunon ki ʙar jahudu nasoro nozil şud), ʙehtar az onon ʙa rohi hidojat meraftem. Hamono ʙar şumo niz az çoniʙi Parvardigoraton daleli ravşan va hidojat ʙa sūi haq rahmat ʙa ummat faro rasid. Va kist sitamgortar az kase, ki ojoti Allohro durūƣ pindorad va az onho rūj ʙigardonad? Ba zudī kasonero, ki az ojoti Mo rūj megardonand, ʙa saʙaʙi in rūjgardoniaşon az ojoti Mo, dar otaşi çahannam ʙa azoʙi ʙad çazo xohem dod
